title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Competencies: Computing Thinking Education Curriculum Through Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can logically design language data analysis algorithms using collaborative problem-solving strategies
Learners can improve computational thinking-based project outcomes based on peer feedback.
Learners can solve computing problems arising during group activities through decomposition, pattern recognition, abstraction, and algorithm design stages.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
